title: Chrissy Teigen: John Legend and I are pregnant
text:

Join the Conversation To find out more about Facebook commenting please read the Conversation Guidelines and FAQs Chrissy Teigen: John Legend and I are pregnant Carly Mallenbaum, USA TODAY 11:39 a.m. EDT October 13, 2015 Model Chrissy Teigen (L) and recording artist John Legend attend the 2015 MTV Video Music Awards at Microsoft Theater on August 30, 2015 in Los Angeles, California. (Photo: Jason Merritt/Getty Images) CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
Expect plenty of belly photos coming your way, because one of our favorite social media personalities is expecting her first child. 
Chrissy Teigen, the supermodel, TV host and wife of singer John Legend, posted her good news on Instagram with the caption: "John and I are so happy to announce that we are pregnant." A photo posted by chrissy teigen (@chrissyteigen) on Oct 12, 2015 at 4:55pm PDT 
The post went on: "As many of you know, we've been trying to have a baby for a while now. It hasn't been easy, but we kept trying because we can't wait to bring our first child into the world and grow our family. " 
Teigen recently opened up about her fertility struggles on her lifestyle show, FABlife . 
The rest of the caption reads: "We're so excited that it's finally happening. Thank you for all your love and well wishes. I look forward to all the belly touching! Xx" â€” John Legend (@johnlegend) October 13, 2015 John Legend and Chrissy Teigen are expecting their first child. Kevin Mazur/MTV1415, WireImage Take a look back at the pair though the years.
